Sodium Scorpio's Black and Grey Waitress Skirt with Leg Warmers
Jupe noire et grise avec jambières de serveuse du Scorpio's de Sodium
Schwarz und grauer Sodium-Scorpio's Kellnerinnen-Rock mit Legwarmer
Gonna da cameriera dello Scorpio's di Sodium nera e grigia con scaldamuscoli
Falda de camarera negra y gris con calentadores de Scorpio’s en Sodium

Sodium Scorpio's Black and Grey Waitress Skirt with Leg Warmers
kDesc
Wear this with The Black and Grey Waitress Shirt whilst working in Scorpio’s Bar to earn Sodium credits. [#Legal]
Portez cette jupe avec la chemise noire et grise de serveuse pour servir au bar Scorpio’s afin de gagner des crédits Sodium. [#Legal]
Trage diesen Artikel mit dem schwarz und grauen Kellnerinnen-Hemd, wenn du in Scorpio's Bar arbeitest, um Sodium-Credits zu verdienen. [#Legal]
Indossala insieme alla camicia da cameriera nera e grigia mentre lavori al Bar Scorpio's per guadagnare Crediti Sodium. [#Legal]
Combínala con la camisa de camarera negra y gris mientras trabajas en Scorpio's para conseguir créditos Sodium. [#Legal]
Scorpio's のバーで働いて Sodiumクレジットを稼ぐ際、このアイテムを着用しよう。 [#Legal]
이 치마와 레그워머를 흑/회색 웨이트리스 셔츠와 함께 입고 Scorpio's 바에서 일하면 Sodium 포인트를 적립할 수 있습니다. [#Legal]
Wear this with The Black and Grey Waitress Shirt whilst working in Scorpio’s Bar to earn Sodium credits. [#Legal]
在 Scorpio's 酒吧工作時穿著本制服與灰黑色侍應生上衣，可賺取Sodium積分。[#Legal]
在 Scorpio's 酒吧工作時穿著本制服與灰黑色服務生上衣，可賺取Sodium積分。[#Legal]
Wear this with The Black and Grey Waitress Shirt whilst working in Scorpio’s Bar to earn Sodium credits. [#Legal]
